page.title: 14WALTER'S FAVOURITE SUNDAY
page.content: I get up at 10am on Sundays and have my breakfast. I then go out to my motor bike and fill the tank and check the oil level. I get my protective clothing on and test the bike. At 1pm my Dad and I put the bike in the van and go scrambling. We race every fortnight at different tracks.{Scrambling}is a form of racing on a dirt track. My bike is a 80cc model and it will go about 70 mph. My friend Tony, who lives down the road, has a 125cc bike and comes with us. When we get to the track we all go round the track once and then go back to the starting line. There are different races for different size bikes. After the racing I go home and clean my bike and it takes ages !
